Alley_Hunter.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
Alley_Hunter.name: Alley Hunter
Alley_Hunter.effect: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2~4% every second up to a max of 20~40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4~8% per second until it reaches 0%.

Amos_Bow.description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires the more.
Amos_Bow.name: Amos' Bow
Amos_Bow.effect: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8~16% every 0.1 seconds up to 5 times.

Aqua_Simulacra.description: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.
Aqua_Simulacra.name: Aqua Simulacra
Aqua_Simulacra.effect: HP is increased by 16~32%. When there are opponents nearby, the DMG dealt by the wielder of this weapon is increased by 20~40%. This will take effect whether the character is on-field or not.

Blackcliff_Warbow.description: A bow made of blackstone that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.
Blackcliff_Warbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
Blackcliff_Warbow.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Compound_Bow.description: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
Compound_Bow.name: Compound Bow
Compound_Bow.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Bow Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Compound_Bow.effect: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4~8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2~2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Ebony_Bow.description: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.
Ebony_Bow.name: Ebony Bow
Ebony_Bow.effect: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 40~80%.

Elegy_for_the_End.description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
Elegy_for_the_End.name: Elegy for the End
Elegy_for_the_End.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60~120. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by 100~200 and increases ATK by 20~40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Fading_Twilight.description: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.
Fading_Twilight.name: Fading Twilight
Fading_Twilight.effect: Has three states, Evengleam, Afterglow, and Dawnblaze, which increase DMG dealt by 6%/10%/14%~12%/20%/28% respectively. When attacks hit opponents, this weapon will switch to the next state. This weapon can change states once every 7s. The character equipping this weapon can still trigger the state switch while not on the field.

Favonius_Warbow.description: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.
Favonius_Warbow.name: Favonius Warbow
Favonius_Warbow.effect: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

Hamayumi.description: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
Hamayumi.name: Hamayumi
Hamayumi.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Bow Billet, 50x Amethyst Lump, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Hamayumi.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16~32% and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Hunter_Bow.description: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.
Hunter_Bow.name: Hunter's Bow

Hunters_Path.name: Hunter's Path
Hunters_Path.effectName: At the End of the Beast-Paths
Hunters_Path.effect: Gain 12~24% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain the Tireless Hunt effect after hitting an opponent with a Charged Attack. This effect increases Charged Attack DMG by 160~320% of Elemental Mastery. This effect will be removed after 12 Charged Attacks or 10s. Only 1 instance of Tireless Hunt can be gained every 12s.

Kings_Squire.name: King's Squire
Kings_Squire.effect: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by 60~140 for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal 100~180% of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

Messenger.description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
Messenger.name: Messenger
Messenger.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional 100~200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Mitternachts_Waltz.description: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.
Mitternachts_Waltz.name: Mitternachts Waltz
Mitternachts_Waltz.effect: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20~40% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20~40% for 5s.

Mouun_Moon.description: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.
Mouun_Moon.name: Mouun's Moon
Mouun_Moon.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Polar_Star.description: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.
Polar_Star.name: Polar Star
Polar_Star.effect: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 12~24%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by 10/20/30/48~20/40/60/96%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

Predator.description: A uniquely designed bow. This should not belong in this world.
Predator.name: Predator
Predator.obtained: Given via the Mail on PS4/PS5 between Version 2.1~2.3, obtainable on PC/Mobile via cross save
Predator.effect:
Effective for players on "PlayStation Network" only.
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

Prototype_Crescent.description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.
Prototype_Crescent.name: Prototype Crescent
Prototype_Crescent.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Bow Billet, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Prototype_Crescent.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36~72% for 10s.

Raven_Bow.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
Raven_Bow.name: Raven Bow
Raven_Bow.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12~24%.

Recurve_Bow.description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.
Recurve_Bow.name: Recurve Bow

Royal_Bow.description: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.
Royal_Bow.name: Royal Bow
Royal_Bow.effect: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Rust.description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
Rust.name: Rust
Rust.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40~80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Sacrificial_Bow.description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
Sacrificial_Bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
Sacrificial_Bow.effect: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

Seasoned_Hunter_Bow.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.
Seasoned_Hunter_Bow.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow

Sharpshooter_Oath.description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
Sharpshooter_Oath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
Sharpshooter_Oath.effect: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24~48%.

Skyward_Harp.description: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.
Skyward_Harp.name: Skyward Harp
Skyward_Harp.effect: Increases CRIT DMG by 20~40%. Hits have a 60~100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4~2s.

Slingshot.description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
Slingshot.name: Slingshot
Slingshot.effect: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36~60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

The_Stringless.description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
The_Stringless.name: The Stringless
The_Stringless.effect: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24~48%.

The_Viridescent_Hunt.description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
The_Viridescent_Hunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
The_Viridescent_Hunt.effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40~80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14~10s.

Thundering_Pulse.description: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.
Thundering_Pulse.name: Thundering Pulse
Thundering_Pulse.effect: Increases ATK by 20~40% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by 12/24/40~24/48/80%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Trawler.name: Trawler
Trawler.effect: Triggers the Flowrider effect after using an Elemental Skill, dealing 80~160% ATK as AoE DMG upon hitting an opponent with an attack. Flowrider will be removed after 15s or after causing 3 instances of AoE DMG. Only 1 instance of AoE DMG can be caused every 2s in this way. Flowrider can be triggered once every 12s.

Windblume_Ode.description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
Windblume_Ode.name: Windblume Ode
Windblume_Ode.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16~32% for 6s.
